name: UIActivityItemsConfiguration
desc: A configuration that allows a responder to export data through a variety of interactions.

items.name: init(objects: [NSItemProviderWriting])
items.desc: Initializes and returns an activity items configuration with the specified objects.

items.name: init(itemProviders: [NSItemProvider])
items.desc: Initializes and returns an activity items configuration with the specified item providers.

items.name: var localObject: Any?
items.desc: A local object that represents the configuration.

items.name: var metadataProvider: ((UIActivityItemsConfigurationMetadataKey) -> Any?)?
items.desc: A closure that provides metadata for the activity items.

items.name: var perItemMetadataProvider: ((Int, UIActivityItemsConfigurationMetadataKey) -> Any?)?
items.desc: A closure that provides metadata for each activity item.

items.name: var applicationActivitiesProvider: (() -> [UIActivity])?
items.desc: A closure that provides application acitivites for the activity items.

items.name: struct UIActivityItemsConfigurationMetadataKey
items.desc: A structure that defines keys for the metadata associated with an activity items configuration.

items.name: var supportedInteractions: [UIActivityItemsConfigurationInteraction]
items.desc: The types of interactions that the configuration supports.

items.name: struct UIActivityItemsConfigurationInteraction
items.desc: A structure that describes types of interactions.

items.name: var previewProvider: ((Int, UIActivityItemsConfigurationPreviewIntent, CGSize) -> NSItemProvider?)?
items.desc: A closure that provides previews for the activity items.

items.name: struct UIActivityItemsConfigurationPreviewIntent
items.desc: A structure that specifies the types of activity item previews.
